description: This file provides function declarations for Base64 encoding and decoding operations, including comments and licensing information.

methods.name: icEncodeBase64
methods.description: Encodes a binary byte array into a Base64 string. The caller is responsible for freeing the returned string.

methods.name: icDecodeBase64
methods.description: Decodes a Base64 string into a byte array, returning a boolean success indicator. The caller must free the allocated array on success.
